sys_ux_client_script.name: stylized_text_237_css

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_cc1c1b1f7723011061b80bbc3c5a9914
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Usage">93e3bed97763011061b80bbc3c5a991e</macroponent><name>stylized_text_237_css</name><preset/><required_translations>[ {
  "code" : "",
  "message" : "Maximize",
  "comment" : ""
}, {
  "code" : "",
  "message" : "Minimize",
  "comment" : ""
} ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function evaluateProperty({
    api,
    helpers
}) {
    var changePerc = api.data.verticalA_headlinemetric1.output.result[0].changeperc;
    var direction = api.data.verticalA_headlinemetric1.output.result[0].direction_label;
    var max_translated = helpers.translateSync("Maximize");
    var min_translated = helpers.translateSync("Minimize");

    if (direction == max_translated) {
        if (changePerc < 0) {
            return '* { font-size: 16px; color:RGB(var(--now-color_alert--critical-0))}';

        } else {
            return '* { font-size: 16px; color:RGB(var(--now-color_alert--positive-0))}';
        }
    } else if (direction == min_translated)
        if (changePerc > 0) {
            return '* { font-size: 16px; color:RGB(var(--now-color_alert--critical-0))}';

        } else {
            return '* { font-size: 16px; color:RGB(var(--now-color_alert--positive-0))}';
        }
    else {
        return '* { font-size: 16px; }';
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-05-24 13:44:33</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>cc1c1b1f7723011061b80bbc3c5a9914</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>stylized_text_237_css</sys_name><sys_package display_value="CIO Dashboard" source="sn_ciodashboard">9f21ea597723011061b80bbc3c5a9931</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="CIO Dashboard">9f21ea597723011061b80bbc3c5a9931</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_cc1c1b1f7723011061b80bbc3c5a9914</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-10-09 06:06:44</sys_updated_on><target/><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script><sys_claim action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><claim_owner_scope display_value="CIO Dashboard">9f21ea597723011061b80bbc3c5a9931</claim_owner_scope><claim_timestamp>18c25fe5fe20000001</claim_timestamp><metadata_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_cc1c1b1f7723011061b80bbc3c5a9914</metadata_update_name><previous_claim_app_version>1.0.2</previous_claim_app_version><previous_claim_name>CIO Dashboard</previous_claim_name><previous_claim_scope>9f21ea597723011061b80bbc3c5a9931</previous_claim_scope><sys_created_by>VelentL</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-12-01 15:27:56</sys_created_on><sys_id>6ba787561b36351064122144b24bcba3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>VelentL</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-12-01 15:27:56</sys_updated_on></sys_claim></record_update>
